pages.text: A shield similar to an eldritch creature.$(br)Why does it look like an eye with teeth? What kind of creature looks like that?$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Blocking damage grants a short duration damage boost.
Combine a $(l:extrastuck:shields/jawbiter)jawbiter$(/l) and a grimoire for summoning the zoologically dubious in a punch designix.
